Title: Access Task Parameters in C# script
Content: This method returns the value of the Parameter named TaskParameter at runtime: ROBOCODE0 This shows how the typed Parameter value is accessible in the script. ROBOIMAGE0 To get a Parameter value as string during the Task script runtime, use the following method: ROBOCODE1 This method returns the string Hello World!. Parameters are always read only, so you are not able to set them to a new value during the Task script runtime.
